content.title: Intro
content.content:
-uva is a Quenya future tense ending.

A final -a drops out before the ending -uva is added; quanta- "fill", future tense quantuva "shall fill".

content.title: Examples
content.content:
laituvalmet = "we shall bless them"[1]
tiruvantes = “they will guard it”
enquantuva = "shall refill"
cenuva = "Shall see"[2]
entuluva = "Come again" [3]
